title: Phyll Opoku-Gyimah
subtitle: My Chosen Family: Some of the @ukblackpride team met on Sunday to reflect, debrief and plan for 2020. title: UN Geneva
subtitle:
All refugees deserve the chance to live a life of peace and dignity.

Every migrant should be treated with dignity.
Every migrant should be treated with respect. 
Every migrant should be treated humanely.

http://www.unhcr.org/ 
#StandUp4HumanRightspic.twitter.com/LAdmTvvpLs

title: CroatianBaptistAid
subtitle: We are grateful for all our friends and partners, whose help has enabled us to directly assist refugees in the Vucjak refugee camp with Non-Food items, Hygiene kits and WASH projects.While you celebrate Christmas with your loved ones, don’t forget to pray for refugees. pic.twitter.com/ZowWYoyVBa

title: Siddig Feana
subtitle: This is the case of racism. Sudanese refugees in all UNHCR centers for refugees from Egypt, Libya, Jordan, Tunisia, Morocco, Niger. You get an employee who says we heard you, we call you completely disregard. pic.twitter.com/kFk6igSVWM

title: St. Margaret's House
subtitle: Earlier this year, our Yoganest studio hosted @ompowerproject for the first time in the UK. It empowers refugees to lead themselves & members of their communities in the healing practice of trauma-informed yoga. 5 participants graduated following the 10-day long training! pic.twitter.com/VHldx53XUi

title: Choose Love / Help Refugees
subtitle:
For many refugees, arrival in a place of safety is just the start of the journey. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
This holiday season, help a person on the long path towards rebuilding their life. 
⁣⁣
Go to the 'Future' section of http://www.choose.love  and give someone a helping hand today.pic.twitter.com/HRoDZYprKM

title: SRS
subtitle: A huge thank you from all at SRS to the more than 160 people who have helped us reach our crowdfunding target & protect vital services for refugees in Suffolk!! Our appeal is open until 3rd Jan & there are still international food experiences up for grabs! https://www.crowdfunder.co.uk/suffolk-refugee-support-advice-service …pic.twitter.com/8bt93ynHtE

title: Charlie the Fox
subtitle:
This is a story that's always fascinated me: a mostly Kurdish refugee camp in Greece, abandoned by the state due to Turkish pressure, but surviving through self-organisation and Democratic Confederalism.

http://www.kedistan.net/2018/03/07/lavrio-self-governed-camp-kurdish-exiles/ …pic.twitter.com/4WYdT8IpnB
